game.name: Crimson Colosseum
game.shortDescription: Captured by a group on her way back home, the swordswoman Sachi is brought to a mysterious colosseum to serve as its latest cursed fighter. To escape from her predicament, she must defeat 7 other fighters to get back home...
game.shortDescriptionEn: Captured by a group on her way back home, the swordswoman Sachi is brought to a mysterious colosseum to serve as its latest cursed fighter. To escape from her predicament, she must defeat 7 other fighters to get back home...

reviewHighlights.text: Bit of a brutal game in terms of setting and premise. Comes with a unique yet simple story line and dice/card based mechanic.
